title: Software Engineer-M.Sc. Computer Science/ Maths (Only females)
jobDescription:
Dear Candidates,
Greetings from Rapid care Pvt Ltd,
We are Looking for Complete Fresher M.sc Mathematics Passed out Candidates
*Please Note We Require Only Female Candidates*
Eligibility and Qualification
EXPERIENCE - FresherQUALIFICATION - M.sc MathematicsGENDER - Only FemaleAGE - Below 24YEARS OF PASSED OUT - Looking for 2023 Passed out Students ( ONLY M.SC Mathematics )
JOB DESCRIPTION
For M.Sc Mathematics :
Should be interested in programming but need not have prior experienceMust have strong background / clarity in the following areas

  • Linear Algebra & Matrices
  • Calculus
  • Statistics
  • Probability
  • Eligibility and Qualification

For M.Sc. Computer Science:
JOB DESCRIPTION

  • Meeting with development managers to discuss the scope of software projects.
  • Analyzing existing programs for modification purposes.
  • Researching and designing new software systems, websites, programs, and applications.
  • Writing and implementing, clean, scalable code.
  • Troubleshooting and debugging code.
  • Verifying and deploying software systems.
  • Evaluating user feedback.

Developer Requirements

  • Bachelors degree in computer science.
  • Advanced knowledge of programming languages including JavaScript, HTML5, Java, C++, and PHP.
  • Knowledge of software systems and frameworks including AnglularJS, Git, GitHub, and .NET.
  • Experience with object-Relational Mapping (ORM) frameworks.
  • Familiarity with Agile development technologies.
  • Ability to learn new languages and technologies quickly.
  • Good communication skills.
  • Ability to work as part of a team or individually on a project.
  • Ability to work well under pressure

The candidate who apply for this should should have graduated either in the year 2022 or 2023.
We are Looking for Immediate Joiners , Interested Candidate Can come for a Direct Walk-in from 20th September, 2023 till 30th September, 2023.or can reach out to us through the number given below
HR Nanditha : 7305704505

title: Software Testing Engineer (Senior & Junior)
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Bangalore/Bengaluru
jobDescription:
We are looking for senior and junior software testing engineers to join our QA team. As a software testing engineer, you will be responsible for evaluating software functions and designing test protocols to ensure that products work as intended. You will also be responsible for completing all testing procedures, suggesting performance changes, and preparing performance reports for the product and RD managers.

The successful candidate should have advanced knowledge in software design and engineering, a good eye for detail, and a natural gift for software troubleshooting. A skilled software test engineer should be able to identify even the smallest flaw in software designs and suggest simple yet effective fixes.

Responsibilities:

  • Meet with product and RD managers to discuss software specifications and controls.
  • Use the software as intended to analyze its functional properties.
  • Design manual and automated test procedures to evaluate each software product.
    • Building, coding, and implementing software evaluation test programs.
  • Running test programs to ensure that testing protocols evaluate the software correctly.

    • Tweaking the software testing systems for maximum performance. Finalizing and documenting testing procedures. Completing final tests and creating test reports. Presenting test reports to management and suggesting software fixes.

    Requirements:

  • Bachelor s degree in computer science, software engineering, or similar field.
    • Proven work experience as a software test engineer.
  • In-depth knowledge of program testing software including Bugzilla and selenium.
    • Advanced knowledge of debugging codes and software development languages.
  • Experience working with popular operating systems including Windows and Linux.
    • Strong attention to detail. Ability to collect data and compile test reports.
  • Excellent software troubleshooting skills.
    • Ability to design and write complex software testing procedures.

title: Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
We are searching for a strong software engineer with a data engineering bent of mind to work on our flagship feature store product, Enrich. You will work on extending functionality for Enrich as well as delivering working systems atop Enrich for Scribble s customers with high attention-to-detail ensuring trust, robustness, performance, and ease of use. Here are all the details you ll need, to see if we can work together:

  • You will develop high-performance data processing systems for dealing with internet-scale data.
  • You will develop and deploy robust, distributed, scalable, real-time, data processing infrastructure that can support various downstream applications including reporting, analytics, user intelligence, machine learning, and decision support.
  • You have strong software engineering skills, system-level thinking and problem-solving ability paired with the love to build and ship robust code.
  • You accept nothing less than top-quality code and think in terms of code reviews, unit, integration, end to end tests in a fast-moving development environment, delivering incremental value daily.

Your Strengths
  • 5 years industry experience; plus points if any of those were spent building data infrastructure
  • Fluent in Python; you know the language and its quirks, not having just written scripts
  • Strong command of SQL
  • Strong understanding of computer science concepts (OOD, algorithm design, data structures, execution and memory optimization)
  • Experience developing and publishing APIs using web services
  • Plus points for experience implementing systems for data workflow management
  • Bachelors/Masters in Computer Science

Nice to Have
  • Experience using at least some among distributed storage (e.g. S3), serverless architecture (e.g. Lambda), streaming data (e.g. Kafka), scalable search (e.g. Elasticsearch)
  • Experience with big data technologies like map-reduce, NoSQL, Spark, HBase, Hive
  • Experience with data security protocols and data access controls

Does this sound like you?
  • You like adventure and have a stomach for learning and unlearning every day
  • You are excited by powering up a whole generation of upcoming data applications
  • You dream big and believe that hard problems need streamlined systems and massive amounts of data to tackle effectively
  • You embrace uncertainty and can develop processes and systems to handle rapidly evolving requirements
  • You have a sense of humour

jobDescription:
We are looking for an experienced software engineer to help build and scale Foosilz s cloud infrastructure. You ll be responsible for architecting, implementing, scaling, and maintaining our compute infrastructure and instituting best practices for our technology stack. You ll work closely with the engineering team to scope and develop new features for Foosilz s product development and infrastructure.
Responsibilities
  • Design, develop and support applications and systems under the team s scope,
  • Write clean, maintainable, performant, and well-tested code to implement new features and fix bugs.
  • Write unit tests, integration tests, and work with QA to coordinate timely regression for new features.
  • Monitor live system metrics, respond to alerts, and troubleshoot production issues.
  • Investigate and understand existing system technical functionality and propose technical improvements.
  • Collaborate with Product, Design, and Business stakeholders to plan and prioritize new feature development.
  • Communicate changes in project estimates, dependencies, and blockers with affected stakeholders quickly.
  • Own feature development and projects through design, development, testing, release and production.
  • Understand and improve the scalability, maintainability, availability, and visibility of applications.
  • Be flexible and quick to respond to changing business priorities and requirements.
  • Document newly implemented technologies and application functionality.
  • Learn new technologies, practices and business concepts to solve new problems as Foosilzs grows.
  • Work with technologies such as MySQL, Elasticsearch, Mongodb, Redis, GraphQL, Php, Python, Javascript, VueJs, Docker, Kubernetes.
Requirements
  • BS/MS in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent industry experience.
  • Expert knowledge of REST APIs.
  • Experience with microservices, or service oriented architecture.
  • Experience with databases (either SQL or NoSQL)
  • Good unit testing and integration testing practices.
  • Experience with message queue architecture.
  • Good communication skills with positive attitude.
Good to have
  • Experience writing code in Rust, Python, Javascript
  • Working with open source technologies such as Kafka, Debezium, Elasticsearch, etc
  • Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience with Video Streaming
  • Knowledge of GraphQL, GRPC, React or any other Javascript frameworks
  • Experience working in an Agile/SCRUM Software Development Process

title: Lead Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• Scribble Data customers trust them with their data and the outputs and expect cutting-edge tools and thought processes
  • The product is at the center of the relationship with customers
  • We work smart, invest in tools and tech that are on the cutting edge of advanced analytics, and package all that we ve learnt about efficiency and data mileage into our products
As a Lead Engineer, you will work on extending functionality for Hasper. Your role will also include delivering working systems atop Hasper for Scribble s customers with high attention-to-detail ensuring trust, robustness, performance, and ease of use. Your responsibilities will include:

  • Develop high-performance data processing systems.
  • Develop and deploy robust, distributed, scalable, near real-time, data processing infrastructure that can support various downstream applications including reporting, analytics, user intelligence, machine learning, and decision support.
  • Incorporate customer feedback and new asks from customers into ongoing deliverables.
  • Accept nothing less than top-quality code and think in terms of code reviews, unit, integration, end-to-end tests in a fast-moving development environment, delivering incremental value daily.
  • Track and research emerging trends as well as competitors, thereby creating feedback loops for the product team.

Requirements

  • 5+ years industry experience in backend development
  • Fluency in Python; you know the language and its quirks, not having just written scripts.
  • Strong command of SQL.
  • Strong understanding of computer science concepts (OOD, algorithm design, data structures, algorithms, execution, and memory optimization).
  • Strong software engineering skills, system-level thinking, and problem-solving ability paired with the love to build and ship robust code.
  • Experience developing and publishing APIs using web services.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills to work with stakeholders from different backgrounds.
  • Bachelors/Masters in Computer Science.

Skills that will give you an edge

  • Having built a product at a start-up.
  • Experience in building data infrastructure / systems for data workflow management.
  • Experience in full-stack development.
  • Experience working in data-heavy applications
  • Fluency with Pandas
  • Experience using at least some among distributed storage (e.g. S3), serverless architecture (e.g. Lambda), streaming data (e.g. Kafka), and scalable search (e.g. Elasticsearch).
  • Experience with big data technologies like map-reduce, NoSQL, Spark, HBase, and Hive.
  • Experience with data security protocols and data access controls.
Product Technology Stack

  • Python and SQL
  • Python data science libraries (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, spacy, etc.)
  • Deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, etc
  • R, Matlab
We want you to know

  • Primarily remote work
  • A work culture that helps you innovate and evolve continuously
  • A chance to shape the future of ML, marrying it with generative AI
  • Financial services domain that is career defining
Does this sound like you

  • You like adventure and have a stomach for learning and unlearning every day
  • You are excited by powering up a whole generation of upcoming data applications
  • You dream big and believe that hard problems need streamlined systems and massive amounts of data to tackle effectively
  • You embrace uncertainty and can develop processes and systems to handle rapidly evolving requirements
  • You have the discipline to take audacious goals and break down years-long roadmaps into near term deliverables that provide value to business stakeholders
  • You enjoy educating your customers and team members about what it means to be data-oriented and cultivating engineering best practices
  • You are comfortable selling to customers (not a biggie)
  • You have a sense of humour

title: Sr. Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• As part of a team, you will provide systems level support for over 3,000 mission critical application production and non production servers
  • Your responsibilities include technical trouble shooting and providing solutions to complex issues, plus work on capacity planning and providing recommendations
  • This role will include project work and interacting with multiple team members

Is this role right for you?

  • You thrive on multi tasking and prioritizing work to meet deadlines in a large complex environment
  • You embrace 2nd level UNIX support on production issues, participating in Incident Management / Problem Management / Change Management; and working on security vulnerabilities as part of the audit and compliance requirements
  • You get to work on Solaris, Linux operating systems running on Oracle Sparc and x86 HW products, virtual hosts including LDoms, VMware You also get to work with Veritas Clustering/Storage Foundation, RedHat clustering, Solaris ZFS, Disk Suite (ODS), and EMC/Hitachi SAN storage products
  • You will monitor the environment and identify any issues which could be of a risk and then rectify
  • You will work on automation using Ansible for implementing changes, patching, fixing security vulnerabilities and writing scripts for system monitoring in Solaris and Linux env
  • You provide assistance to project management functions during all stages of requirements rollout including assessment, planning, initiation, implementation and management
  • As part of your DNA , you are detail oriented, proactive, have an eagerness to learn and thrive on challenges
  • You will participate in semi annual Disaster Recovery (DR) fail over testing on regular basis as outlined in the banks policies and procedures, to ensure DR functionality
  • And, when required, update the policies and procedures as required

Do you have the skills that will enable you to succeed in this role?

  • You can demonstrate excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • You have hands on technical working experience in the administration, configuration & software builds in a large enterprise environment
  • You have at least 7+ years of hands on technical working experience with the system administration, installation, configuration & troubleshooting of Solaris (versions 10/11) and Red Hat Linux (versions 6/7/8) Operating Systems
  • You have at least 7+ of hands on technical working experience with the configuration, administration, builds and troubleshooting of Veritas/Symantec Storage Foundation (VSF) & Veritas/Symantec Cluster Services
  • You have at least 7+ of hands on technical working experience with Network Information Service (NFS), Solaris Zones & Solaris Logical Domains (LDoms) (NIS), Network File System
  • You have at least 7+ years of hands on experience with ZFS and Solaris Volume manager
  • You can demonstrate a very good technical working knowledge of SAN and Virtualization platforms/technologies
  • You possess very good scripting capabilities (eg, shell, perl) to complete day to day UNIX tasks
  • You have experience working with Oracle sparc and X86 hardware failures and trouble shooting, working with vendors for resolution You have good problem solving, troubleshooting and analytical skills
  • You can work well under pressure with time constraints and can prioritize competing priorities appropriately
  • You have completed a post secondary education in Computer Science, Engineering or in a related field of study

title: Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• Ability to write code that others can understand, support, maintain and expand, and provide other team members with direction on development projects.
  • Aware of trends and technical developments in the industry, and how those can be applied in your work; and have a point of view on the delivery approach for very complex or foundational features.
  • Have Demonstrated ability to anticipate technology lifecycle issues, work with projects involving multiple systems, and influence the team to deliver durable, extensible solutions.
  • Special mix of technical ability, curiosity, and an analytical mind to help us ensure every line of code we push to production as part of the Business Technology applications is of the highest quality.
  • As Salesforce Senior Developer, you would be part of the engineering team, working closely with other technical staff members, business systems analyst and product owner who are responsible for adding new features or improving the current applications.
  • Quick learner, self-starter with the ability to work under pressure, meet aggressive deadlines and handle multiple projects/tasks simultaneously.
  • Ability to work in a fun, creative and fast paced environment.
Responsible to adapt quickly, motivate people, instill accountability and achieve results
  • Possess good oral and written communication/documentation skills and be able to interact with other team members to deliver fast and reliable code.
Be able to contribute ideas and provide feedback on many projects within the team s portfolio.
  • 7+ years of experience programming with Apex and Visualforce
  • Strong hands-on experience in Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components (LWC), Flows
  • Experience with Salesforce integrations and API development
  • Extensive experience with HTML and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)
  • 5+ years of extensive experience implementing Sales Cloud and Service Cloud
  • Experience in design of complex Salesforce data model, security model, and sharing settings
  • Experience developing in an enterprise environment such as source code control, IDE, continuous deployment, release management (Perforce, Git, Eclipse, Jenkins)
  • Plan, design and enhance automation framework, utilities and tools is a plus.
  • Experience in Quality Engineering developing test framework using an OOP language, such as Apex, Java, C#, etc. and testing in web-based environment, SaaS preferred is a plus.
  • Document test plans and publish test results with the goal of continuous improvement in code quality, test coverage (functionality and code)
  • Ability to lead and influence the design approach to new applications and features.
  • Ability to lead, participate and contribute to product code reviews.
  • Diagnose, track and manage quality issues to resolution required.
  • Effectively communicate skill with all stakholder
  • Ability to mentor and develop junior team members.
Participate in product and feature design with technical staff members, business systems analyst and product managers influence the outcomes
  • Masters degree - ideally in Computer Science, Engineering or MIS
  • Minimum Salesforce certified:
    • Salesforce Administrator (Mandatory)
    • Salesforce Platform App Builder ( Optional)
    • Salesforce Platform Developer I (Mandatory)
    • Salesforce Platform Developer II (Mandatory)
    • Salesforce Application Architect (Optional)
  • 10+ years of Experience developing with Force.com ( Visualforce Apex Code) and Java
  • Experience developing on the Salesforce.com platform API s
  • Enterprise system integration background w/ Web Services
  • Experience working with Agile/Scrum methodology
  • Experience with Selenium automation is preferable
  • Understanding of various user based security models
  • Excellent cross-group communication and problem solving skills
  • Additional Certification like Salesforce Application architects are desired
Familiarity with Mulesoft, Tableau, Jitterbit, AWS, and Splunk is a plus
  • User Adoption Rate: Measure the percentage of users actively using the Salesforce platform and engaging with the analytics and reports provided.
  • Data Accuracy and Integrity: Monitor the quality and accuracy of data input and output within Salesforce to ensure reliable reporting and decision-making.
  • Process Efficiency Improvements: Track the identification and implementation of process enhancements within the Salesforce platform to streamline sales operations and increase productivity.
  • Report and Dashboard Effectiveness: Evaluate the creation and utilization of meaningful reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights and support informed decision-making for the sales team.
  • Training and Support: Measure the successful delivery of Salesforce training and support to sales team members to ensure their proficiency in using the platform for their sales activities.
  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Adoption : Monitor the integration and utilization of Salesforce CRM functionalities to enhance customer interactions and improve sales strategies.
Alignment with Ford Behaviors of Excellence, Focus and Collaboration

title: STIBO Sr. Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• Working on STIBO STEP configuration and custom development.
  • Keeping up to date with what s current in the STEP platform versions and provide suggestions for upgrade.
  • Setting up new integrations, add object types to the data model, Java Script business rules and workflow.
  • Understanding requirements collaborating with the product management, business teams and transform into solutions and technical design documents.
  • Knowledge of working in an agile delivery environment and proficiency in using Jira/Git.
  • Debugging business rules and any defect resolutions.
  • Evaluate the advantages for the upgrade and collaborate with the Dev Ops team to perform upgrades
  • Ensuring that solutions are scalable and extensible for future needs by running performance tests.
  • Working in close coordination with the production support teams to ensure stability of the system during the peak demands.
  • Build operational readiness and alerts/monitoring to help production support teams in their dayto-day activities.
  • Ensuring PHI/PII data security and compliance.
  • Recommending solutions towards stability, maintainability, and scalability of the STIBO STEP implementation.

What are we looking for

  • You have a BS or MS in Computer Sciences, Engineering, or related field (an equivalent combination of related education, training, and experience may be considered)
  • 5+ Years experience working in Retail industry
  • 5+ years experience working in a cross functional team
  • 5+ years of Expert technical experience in software development using Java, JavaScript, data and database design, SQL, XML, XSD, JSON, Linux and Web services
  • 5+ years of STIBO STEP systems configuration, development, architectural design and integration experience - attribute creation, business rule creation, portal development, integration endpoint configuration and workflow creation.
  • In-depth understanding of relational database (Oracle, DB2 or SQL) and ability to write/review complex operational queries.
  • Good understanding of API RESTful services
  • Capable of defining deployment process and methodologies
  • Should have good technical documentation skills. Must also be able to prepare solutions architecture documents and should be able to thoroughly review all the design documents
  • Build standards and reusable components as part of customization for new functionality on packaged solution
  • Assist the leads/architects in tool evaluations, architectural choices and POCs
  • To have deep, intuitive analytical and problem-solving skills to address and resolve technical development issues in a limited timeframe
  • Ability to prioritize assignments, deal with interruptions, and meet deadlines in a fast paced and growth-oriented environment.
  • Experience to build scalable, reliable and maintainable systems

Preferred Qualifications

  • Stibo STEP Certification is added advantage.
  • MDM/PIM experience preferred.

title: Software Engineer - C++, Windows Internals
tagsAndSkills: malware analysis,C++,Windows OS,windows internals,Provident fund,Soft skills training,OS internals,Wellness
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
The Windows Infrastructure team is a key part of SentinelOnes all-star Windows EPP/EDR development group, that works on our main product line - Endpoint Protection , recognized 3 times in a row as Gartner Magic Quadrant Leader.
In our team we are responsible e.g. for installers, logging, services such as communication layer and interfaces for our Windows agent, for improving the quality, performance and stability of agent and making the user experience smoother.
As a new member of our distributed development team , you will work in user-mode of Windows, and deal with a large variety of fields.
  • You will have the chance to design, develop primarily in modern C++ (20/23), test and debug the most complicated real world problems (often unseen before). In order to successfully deal with this challenge, you will continuously enrich your knowledge and experience with Windows OS internals and the Endpoint Protection as well as Endpoint Detection & Response eco-system.
  • Our team designs and executes important feature enhancements as well as adresses bugs and RCAs. You will also deal with extraordinary performance and optimization challenges, given the scale of our cybersecurity SW (handling hundreds of billions of security events).
  • Your work will influence the security of tens of millions of Windows devices, that we protect at enterprise & government customers across the globe (incl. 4 of Fortune 10s and hundreds of Global 2000s).
What skills & knowledge should you bring?
  • Multiple years of experience as a software developer in the area of low level programming in C++
  • Previous experience of working on a production-grade product with a wide scale deployment
  • Great communication skills
  • Ability to work independently and with peers from different time zones.
It would be an advantage, if you have
  • Hands on experience and In-depth understanding of Windows OS design and internals, experience with Windows low-level development, and development and debugging of Windows applications
  • Deep hands on familiarity with standard debugging and profiling tools for Windows
  • Previous experience with security-oriented development, reversing or malware analysis experience
Why Us?
You will be joining a cutting-edge company, where you will tackle extraordinary challenges and work with the very best in the industry.
  • Flexible working hours and hybrid/remote work model.
  • Flexible Time Off.
  • Flexible Paid Sick Days.
  • Global gender-neutral Parental Leave (16 weeks, beyond the leave provided by the local laws)
  • Generous employee stock plan in the form of RSUs (restricted stock units)
  • On top of RSUs, you can benefit from our attractive ESPP (employee stock purchase plan)
  • Gym membership/sports gears by Cultfit.
  • Wellness Coach app, with 3,000+ on-demand sessions, daily interactive classes, audiobooks, and unlimited private coaching.
  • Private medical insurance plan for you and your family.
  • Life Insurance covered by S1 (for employees)
  • Telemedical app consultation (Practo)
  • Global Employee Assistance Program (confidential counseling related to both personal and work life matters)
  • High-end MacBook or Windows laptop.
  • Home-office-setup allowances (one time) and maintenance allowance.
  • Internet allowances.
  • Provident Fund and Gratuity (as per govt clause)
  • NPS contribution (Employee contribution)
  • Half yearly bonus program depending on the individual and company performance.
  • Above standard referral bonus as per policy.
  • Udemy Business platform for Hard/Soft skills Training & Support for your further educational activities/trainings
  • Sodexo food coupons.

title: Software Engineer
jobDescription:
What you need to know about the role

Software Engineers at PayPal develop innovative solutions and high-quality products that touch millions of people every day around the globe. Our engineers solve some of the most complex technical problems in the world of connected payments across all business units, including PayPal, Braintree, Venmo, Paydiant and others.

Meet our team

We are the PayPal SREs - Infra Dev Services Engineering team primarily responsible for building incident prevention platforms, tools, automation to prevent incidents and improve developer productivity. This team is the driving force behind improving the reliability, performance, and availability of software systems in PayPal.

Our team is looking for a Software Engineer with strong Java skills, solid real-world experience designing and building systems at scale. Passionate about code craftsmanship, continuous improvement, and agile development. Possess a keen desire to deeply understand our products and services to push our technology forward with respect to functionality, performance, reliability, and scalability. Needs to be dynamic, collaborative, and curious as we build new experiences, improve existing products, and develop distributed systems powering the world s largest e-commerce and payments tech giant.

Job Description:

Your way to impact


We are looking for an experienced highly skilled Java Engineer to join our development team. In this role, you will lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust platforms responsible for identifying issues caused by changes proactively. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and efficient solutions that drive our business objectives.

Your day to day

  • Designing, developing, and delivering software related to platforms using Java and front end technologies.

  • Completely own the productionlization, and delivery of the technical solutions that improves productivity, drives operational efficiency.

  • Follows design principles of software engineering and build features to ensure the scalability, performance, and reliability of large-scale applications

  • Develop efficient, elegant, clean code.

  • Work cross-functionally with other engineering, architectural teams, Product, Vendors, project management teams.

  • Lead code review sessions

  • Continuously look for opportunities for automation to build efficient products.

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner to a variety of audiences.

What do you need to bring

  • Education: Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

  • Experience: 2-4 years of experience in Software development.

  • Technical Skills:

  • Strong Object-oriented programming skills and expertise in one of Java/J2EE

  • Experience with REST API s, Java frameworks such as Spring, Unit Testing and build tools.

  • Working experience with databases such as MongoDB/MySQL/ Oracle etc

  • Exposure and Understanding of NoSQL databases and microservices is a plus.

  • Proven track record in delivering highly available, scalable systems on time

  • Conversant in design patterns

  • Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.

  • Experience in Unix based development environment

  • Experience in QA methodologies, test automation and automation frameworks

  • Experience in JUnit, Selenium is a plus

  • Experience working in payments or financial services industry is a plus.

  • Experience working in any of the front end technologies such as React,Angular,Node is a plus

  • Knowledge of code versioning tools, such as Git.

title: Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
We are searching for a strong software engineer with a data engineering bent of mind to work on our flagship feature store product, Enrich. You will work on extending functionality for Enrich as well as delivering working systems atop Enrich for Scribble s customers with high attention-to-detail ensuring trust, robustness, performance, and ease of use. Here are all the details you ll need, to see if we can work together:

  • You will develop high-performance data processing systems for dealing with internet-scale data.
  • You will develop and deploy robust, distributed, scalable, real-time, data processing infrastructure that can support various downstream applications including reporting, analytics, user intelligence, machine learning, and decision support.
  • You have strong software engineering skills, system-level thinking and problem-solving ability paired with the love to build and ship robust code.
  • You accept nothing less than top-quality code and think in terms of code reviews, unit, integration, end to end tests in a fast-moving development environment, delivering incremental value daily.

Your Strengths
  • 5 years industry experience; plus points if any of those were spent building data infrastructure
  • Fluent in Python; you know the language and its quirks, not having just written scripts
  • Strong command of SQL
  • Strong understanding of computer science concepts (OOD, algorithm design, data structures, execution and memory optimization)
  • Experience developing and publishing APIs using web services
  • Plus points for experience implementing systems for data workflow management
  • Bachelors/Masters in Computer Science

Nice to Have
  • Experience using at least some among distributed storage (e.g. S3), serverless architecture (e.g. Lambda), streaming data (e.g. Kafka), scalable search (e.g. Elasticsearch)
  • Experience with big data technologies like map-reduce, NoSQL, Spark, HBase, Hive
  • Experience with data security protocols and data access controls

Does this sound like you?
  • You like adventure and have a stomach for learning and unlearning every day
  • You are excited by powering up a whole generation of upcoming data applications
  • You dream big and believe that hard problems need streamlined systems and massive amounts of data to tackle effectively
  • You embrace uncertainty and can develop processes and systems to handle rapidly evolving requirements
  • You have a sense of humour

title: Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• Ability to write code that others can understand, support, maintain and expand, and provide other team members with direction on development projects.
  • Aware of trends and technical developments in the industry, and how those can be applied in your work; and have a point of view on the delivery approach for very complex or foundational features.
  • Have Demonstrated ability to anticipate technology lifecycle issues, work with projects involving multiple systems, and influence the team to deliver durable, extensible solutions.
  • Special mix of technical ability, curiosity, and an analytical mind to help us ensure every line of code we push to production as part of the Business Technology applications is of the highest quality.
  • As Salesforce Senior Developer, you would be part of the engineering team, working closely with other technical staff members, business systems analyst and product owner who are responsible for adding new features or improving the current applications.
  • Quick learner, self-starter with the ability to work under pressure, meet aggressive deadlines and handle multiple projects/tasks simultaneously.
  • Ability to work in a fun, creative and fast paced environment.
Responsible to adapt quickly, motivate people, instill accountability and achieve results
  • Possess good oral and written communication/documentation skills and be able to interact with other team members to deliver fast and reliable code.
Be able to contribute ideas and provide feedback on many projects within the team s portfolio.
  • 7+ years of experience programming with Apex and Visualforce
  • Strong hands-on experience in Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components (LWC), Flows
  • Experience with Salesforce integrations and API development
  • Extensive experience with HTML and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)
  • 5+ years of extensive experience implementing Sales Cloud and Service Cloud
  • Experience in design of complex Salesforce data model, security model, and sharing settings
  • Experience developing in an enterprise environment such as source code control, IDE, continuous deployment, release management (Perforce, Git, Eclipse, Jenkins)
  • Plan, design and enhance automation framework, utilities and tools is a plus.
  • Experience in Quality Engineering developing test framework using an OOP language, such as Apex, Java, C#, etc. and testing in web-based environment, SaaS preferred is a plus.
  • Document test plans and publish test results with the goal of continuous improvement in code quality, test coverage (functionality and code)
  • Ability to lead and influence the design approach to new applications and features.
  • Ability to lead, participate and contribute to product code reviews.
  • Diagnose, track and manage quality issues to resolution required.
  • Effectively communicate skill with all stakholder
  • Ability to mentor and develop junior team members.
Participate in product and feature design with technical staff members, business systems analyst and product managers influence the outcomes
  • Masters degree - ideally in Computer Science, Engineering or MIS
  • Minimum Salesforce certified:
    • Salesforce Administrator (Mandatory)
    • Salesforce Platform App Builder ( Optional)
    • Salesforce Platform Developer I (Mandatory)
    • Salesforce Platform Developer II (Mandatory)
    • Salesforce Application Architect (Optional)
  • 10+ years of Experience developing with Force.com ( Visualforce Apex Code) and Java
  • Experience developing on the Salesforce.com platform API s
  • Enterprise system integration background w/ Web Services
  • Experience working with Agile/Scrum methodology
  • Experience with Selenium automation is preferable
  • Understanding of various user based security models
  • Excellent cross-group communication and problem solving skills
  • Additional Certification like Salesforce Application architects are desired
Familiarity with Mulesoft, Tableau, Jitterbit, AWS, and Splunk is a plus
  • User Adoption Rate: Measure the percentage of users actively using the Salesforce platform and engaging with the analytics and reports provided.
  • Data Accuracy and Integrity: Monitor the quality and accuracy of data input and output within Salesforce to ensure reliable reporting and decision-making.
  • Process Efficiency Improvements: Track the identification and implementation of process enhancements within the Salesforce platform to streamline sales operations and increase productivity.
  • Report and Dashboard Effectiveness: Evaluate the creation and utilization of meaningful reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights and support informed decision-making for the sales team.
  • Training and Support: Measure the successful delivery of Salesforce training and support to sales team members to ensure their proficiency in using the platform for their sales activities.
  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Adoption : Monitor the integration and utilization of Salesforce CRM functionalities to enhance customer interactions and improve sales strategies.
Alignment with Ford Behaviors of Excellence, Focus and Collaboration

jobDescription:

  • Team player with good interpersonal and communication skills in English
  • Able to place a high value on product/solution s security

- Strong understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles
- Solid knowledge of data structures and algorithms
- Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
- Good communication and teamwork abilities
- Passion for learning and continuous self-improvement

- Experience with Robot Framework or similar test automation frameworks
- Hands-on experience with Pandas and NumPy for data manipulation and analysis
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies
- Understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC)
- Exposure to cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)

  • Ability to manage competing priorities in a fast-paced environment.

title: API Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• As an API Software Engineer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining application programming interfaces (APIs) for our software products
  • You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, software developers, and quality assurance engineers, to ensure the seamless integration of our applications with external systems and services
  • Responsibilities:API Design and Development: Design and develop robust, scalable, and secure APIs that adhere to industry best practices
  • Define API specifications, endpoints, data models, and authentication mechanisms
  • Integration: Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to understand integration requirements and design APIs that enable seamless data exchange between different systems
  • Ensure compatibility, consistency, and reliability of APIs across platforms
  • Prototyping and Testing: Create prototypes and proof-of-concept implementations to validate API design and functionality
  • Write unit tests and conduct integration testing to ensure API reliability, performance, and security
  • Documentation: Create comprehensive technical documentation for APIs, including API reference guides, usage examples, and integration guides
  • Maintain up-to-date documentation for internal and external developers
  • Performance Optimization: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks in API implementation
  • Optimize API response times, throughput, and scalability to meet the needs of high-volume data exchange
  • Security and Authentication: Implement security measures, such as access controls, encryption, and authentication mechanisms (OAuth, JWT, etc), to protect APIs and ensure data privacy
  • Stay up-to-date with industry standards and emerging trends in API security
  • Error Handling and Monitoring: Implement robust error handling mechanisms to provide meaningful error messages and logging for troubleshooting
  • Set up monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and address API issues
  • Collaboration and Support: Collaborate with software development teams to integrate APIs into applications
  • Provide technical support and guidance to internal and external developers using the APIs
  • Continuous Improvement: Stay current with advancements in API technologies and industry trends
  • Evaluate and recommend tools, frameworks, and methodologies to improve API development and integration processes
  • Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
  • Strong programming skills in languages such as Java, Python, or C#
  • Solid understanding of RESTful API design principles, including versioning, error handling, and resource modeling
  • Experience with API development frameworks and tools, such as Swagger, OpenAPI, or Postman
  • Knowledge of API security concepts and protocols, such as OAuth, JWT, and SSL/TLS
  • Familiarity with database technologies and SQL
  • Proficiency in web services (HTTP, JSON, XML) and related technologies (SOAP, GraphQL)
  • Experience with version control systems, such as Git
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills
  • Ability to work in an agile development environment and manage priorities effectively
  • Note: This job description is a general outline of the key responsibilities and qualifications expected of an API Software Engineer
  • Actual job duties may vary depending on the specific organization and project requirements

title: Software Engineer, Frameworks
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
You will be responsible for Testing and Validation of Ethernovia s software. This responsibility includes working closely with the design and hardware validation teams to design, implement, enhance, and run test cases, test plans and test tools.

The test and validation strategy at Ethernovia is geared towards safety critical automotive domain. Hence testing, automation of testing, processing test results, identifying issues, documentation and presentation is of utmost importance to the company s deliverables to our customers.

Also, we build products with strict adherence to Functional Safety and hence every team member is required to fit into a culture of safety and best development practices.

Technical Qualifications

  • Bachelors or Master s degree in Computer Science/Software or related field.
  • Work Experience: 3 years for Mid-level and 7 years for Senior Level position.
  • Strong understanding of Software Development lifecycle including Architecture, Implementation and Testing fundamentals.
  • Proficient in Python programming language, with a minimum of 2 years experience.
  • Experience with integration and testing of open-source middleware, libraries, and drivers.
  • Experience with building test infrastructure and test utilities.
  • Exposure to validation of software or hardware products.
  • Experience in an automotive validation environment is a big plus.
  • Experience with Functional Safety is a big plus.
  • Experience with software testing including applications, middleware, drivers, and firmware.
  • Exposure to System level validation i.e., including software with hardware products.
  • Experience with tools for automation, continuous integration, and dev-ops like Jenkins.

Nice to Have Experience with

  • Databases like SQL.
  • Experience with C/C++ is a plus.
  • Integration with JIRA, Confluence, Version Control tools like Perforce/Git.
  • Meta languages like JSON, XML.
  • Networking testing tools like IXIA.
  • Automated test tools and platforms like TestRail

Soft Skills

  • Self-motivated and able to work effectively both independently and in a team.
  • Excellent communication/documentation skills.
  • Attention to details.

What you ll get in return:

  • Pre IPO stock options
  • Cutting edge technology
  • World class team
  • Competitive base salary
  • Flexible hours
  • Medical, dental and vision insurance for employees
  • Flexible vacation time to promote a healthy work-life balance
  • Paid parental leave to support you and your family

title: Software Engineer
tagsAndSkills: Product engineering,Performance engineering,Postgresql,Consulting,Life sciences,Customer experience,Apache,digital transformation
jobDescription:
• Understand the business requirements and technical constraints and architect/design/develop.
  • Participate in the complete development life cycle.
  • Review the architecture/design/code of self and others.
  • Develop enterprise application features/services using Azure cloud services, C# .NET Core, ReactJS, etc, implementing DevSecOps principles.
  • Own and be accountable for the Quality, Performance, Security, and Sustenance of the respective product deliverables.
  • Strive for self-excellence along with enabling the success of the team/stakeholders.
  • 2 to 6 years of experience in developing enterprise software products
  • Strong knowledge of C#, .NET Core, Azure DevOps
  • Working knowledge of the JS frameworks - React, Angular, etc
  • Experience in container-based development, AKS, Service Fabric, etc
  • Experience in messaging queues like RabbitMQ, Kafka
  • Experience in Azure Services like Azure Logic Apps, Azure Functions
  • Experience in databases like SQL Server, PostgreSQL
  • Knowledge of reporting solutions like PowerBI, Apache SuperSet, etc
  • Knowledge of Micro-Services and/or Micro-Frontend architecture
  • Knowledge of Code Quality, Code Monitoring, Performance Engineering, and Test Automation Tools
We re on a Mission
In 2005, we disrupted the life sciences industry by introducing the world s first digital validation lifecycle management system. ValGenesis VLMS revolutionized compliance-based corporate validation activities and has remained the industry standard.
Today, we continue to push the boundaries of innovation enhancing and expanding our portfolio beyond validation with an end-to-end digital transformation platform. We combine our purpose-built systems with world-class consulting services to help every facet of GxP meet evolving regulations and quality expectations.
The Team You ll Join
  • Our customers success is our success. We keep the customer experience centered in our decisions, from product to marketing to sales to services to support. Life sciences companies exist to improve humanity s quality of life, and we honor that mission.
  • We work together. We communicate openly, support each other without reservation, and never hesitate to wear multiple hats to get the job done.
  • We think big. Innovation is the heart of ValGenesis. That spirit drives product development as well as personal growth. We never stop aiming upward.
  • We re in it to win it. We re on a path to becoming the number one intelligent validation platform in the market, and we won t settle for anything less than being a market leader.
How We Work
Our India offices are onsite, 5 days per week. We believe that in-person interaction and collaboration fosters creativity and a sense of community, and is critical to our future success as a company.
ValGenesis is an equal-opportunity employer that makes employment decisions on the basis of merit. Our goal is to have the best-qualified people in every job. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or any other characteristics protected by local law

title: Software Engineer
jobDescription:
• Working at Oportun means enjoying a differentiated experience of being part of a team that fosters a diverse, equitable and inclusive culture where we all feel a sense of belonging and are encouraged to share our perspectives

  • This inclusive culture is directly connected to our organizations performance and ability to fulfill our mission of delivering affordable credit to those left out of the financial mainstream
  • We celebrate and nurture our inclusive culture through our employee resource groups

Responsibilities:

  • You collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other engineers, to understand business requirements and translate them into efficient and scalable software solutions.
  • You design, develop, test, deploy, support and maintain high-quality software applications using industry best practices and modern technologies. You own issues, including initial troubleshooting, identification of root cause and issue resolution / escalation.(Alternatively , to address verbosity, this can be replaced with You own your code end-to-end. , but it may not be explicitly clear.)
  • You write clean and maintainable code that adheres to industry coding standards and contributes to the overall stability of our systems. You participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to ensure code quality and promote knowledge sharing.
  • You proactively find and address technical debt, inefficient practices/tools and performance bottlenecks and bugs, continuously improving the reliability and performance of our software through building observability and other features to help trouble-shoot/triage issues.
  • You demonstrate proficient usage of tools, techniques and architecture/coding patterns. You have demonstrated you are able to understand trade-offs of various architectural and design choices. Your solutions are focused on solving the needs of your customer.
  • You stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, and proactively propose and implement innovative solutions to enhance our products and services through continuous evolution and refinement of current tools and applications.

Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 3+ years of experience preferably 5 years of related experience with a Bachelors degree.
  • Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions in a timely manner.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a passion for tackling complex technical challenges.
  • Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software design principles.
  • Strong proficiency in Java, Micro services, Spring boot, Spring Framework, RESTful APIs, Hibernate
  • Experience with relational databases like MySQL, MariaDB and SQL
  • Experience in working with version control systems, such as Git.
  • Thorough knowledge in OAuth2
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively in a team-oriented environment.
  • Ability to work independently with minimal help.
  • Ability to quickly learn new technologies and apply them as and when needed
  • Strong Unit and integration testing

Desired:

  • Experience with cloud technologies, preferably AWS or Azure, is desirable.
  • Experience in working on Authentication and Authorization with any Identity Providers
    • Experience in automation with Karate Framework
  • Knowledge/experience in working with DevOps/CICD

title: Software Engineer (Apps)
jobDescription:
• Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs, and modifies software enhancements and/or new products used in local, networked, cloud-based or Internet-related computer programs
  • Code may be used in commercial or end-user applications, such as materials management, financial management, HRIS, mobile apps or desktop applications products
  • Using current programming language and technologies, writes code, completes programming, and performs testing and debugging of applications
  • Completes documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance
  • May interact with users to define system requirements and/or necessary modifications

What we expect

  • Exceptionally good full stack product developer with experience working approximately 2 to 5 years of experience in Java, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Database design and query handling.
  • Experience with RESTful Web Services/Microservices (JSON) creation.
  • Experience in data parsing/processing using batch and stream mode.
  • Proficiency with OS- Linux, virtual machines, and open source tools/platforms
  • Experience in messaging platforms like Kafka, Pub/Sub, ActiveMQ etc. is an added advantage.
  • Understanding of data modelling and storage with NoSQL or relational DBs
  • Experience with Jenkins, Containerized Microservices deployment (Docker or Kubernetes) in Cloud environment build and test environments is an added advantage.
  • Experience in Big Data development (Spark, Hive, Impala, Time-series DB etc.) is an added advantage.
  • Experience in Agile Development methodologies would be desirable.

What we are looking for

  • Solid understanding of building Microservices/Webservices using Java framework.
  • Solid understanding of REST API standards and practices.
  • Strong object-oriented analysis and design patterns.
  • Participate in full integration testing
  • Preferred experience with cloud technologies like Azure, AWS and GCP.

Candidate Profile

  • Telecom domain experience is an added advantage
  • Experience working in at least one of the following protocols is a definite plus. TCP, UDP, SNMP, SSH, FTP, SFTP, Corba, SOAP etc.
  • Need a candidate who is enthusiastic about work and passionate about coding
  • Self-starter who takes initiative and is proactive
  • Cares deeply about writing quality/testable/modular code
  • Excellent communication, analytical and problem solving skills
  • Experience in Big Data platforms like Cloudera, Hortonworks, Apache Hadoop, Apache Spark, YARN, TimescaleDB , Elastic Search etc. is an added advantage.
  • Able to comprehend and contribute during team meetings/ updates
  • Experience in a start-up environment desirable
  • Team leading experience is an added advantage.

title: Robotics Software Engineer Autonomy
jobDescription:
Job Responsibilities:
  • 1.Lead and develop path/motion planning algorithms that include route planning, trajectory optimization, decision making, and open space planning.
  • 2.Develop algorithms including: path planning algorithms for Lane centering, Automatic Lane Change, Lane Keep Assist, Automatic Parking, etc
  • 3.Develop perception algorithms for personnel detect, object detection, tracking, classification, terrain mapping, localization and others.
  • 4.Participate in RD programs through entire lifecycle, from initial inception through production and Research and develop new technology in perception path planning
  • 5.Develop production quality code and own your algorithms from design to production
  • 6.Run simulation for path planning algorithm development and test various scenarios
  • 7.Test code on mining and construction equipment.
  • Desired Qualifications:
    • 1.BE/ME/PhD in Computer Engineering, Robotics Engineering, Mechatronics, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics or a related field.
    • 2.Strong programming skills with C/C using Linux OS, and middle ware such as ROS/ROS2 and DDS.
    • 3.Highly skilled in motion planning and control theory (e.g., model predictive control, vehicle dynamic modeling)
    • 4.Understanding of graph-based data structures (quadtree, octree, KD-tree, etc.) and Precisely localize the vehicle with localization techniques such as SLAM.
    • 5.Knowledge of search-based algorithms, path planning, A, RRT, D , etc.
    • 6.Knowledge of Obstacle avoidance, Behavioral planning, new motion planning algorithms for comfortable and safe trajectories efficiently.
    • 7.Hands-on experience in robotic and/or vehicle system design and implementation and knowledge of vehicle dynamics, kinematics and modeling
    • 8.Experience on programming of Computer vision/perception Systems software, sensor fusion that integrates with perception sensors such as IMU, GPS, Stereo Cameras, Lidar, Radar.
    • 9.Knowledge of PyTorch/CuDNN tools, Python, Tensorflow would be advantage.
    • 10.Experience on ROS (Rosbag and RViz) for simulation with Path planning
    • 11.Strong math background and strong computational geometry skills
    • 12.Knowledge on embedded systems (NVIDIA Jetson, Xavier) xilinx
    • 13.Experience with ADAS would be an advantage.
    • 14.Experience with MATLab / FPGA / ARM processor would be an advantage
  • Preferred Qualifications:
    • 1.Experience with C++ 14/17 and python
    • 2.Experience in modern planning approaches including randomized search methods and trajectory optimization and modern model predictive control and other advanced control techniques.
    • 3.Publications in CVPR/NIPS/ICML/ICLR would be an added advantage.

title: Sr. Software Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• As part of a team, you will provide systems level support for over 3,000 mission critical application production and non production servers
  • Your responsibilities include technical trouble shooting and providing solutions to complex issues, plus work on capacity planning and providing recommendations
  • This role will include project work and interacting with multiple team members

Is this role right for you?

  • You thrive on multi tasking and prioritizing work to meet deadlines in a large complex environment
  • You embrace 2nd level UNIX support on production issues, participating in Incident Management / Problem Management / Change Management; and working on security vulnerabilities as part of the audit and compliance requirements
  • You get to work on Solaris, Linux operating systems running on Oracle Sparc and x86 HW products, virtual hosts including LDoms, VMware You also get to work with Veritas Clustering/Storage Foundation, RedHat clustering, Solaris ZFS, Disk Suite (ODS), and EMC/Hitachi SAN storage products
  • You will monitor the environment and identify any issues which could be of a risk and then rectify
  • You will work on automation using Ansible for implementing changes, patching, fixing security vulnerabilities and writing scripts for system monitoring in Solaris and Linux env
  • You provide assistance to project management functions during all stages of requirements rollout including assessment, planning, initiation, implementation and management
  • As part of your DNA , you are detail oriented, proactive, have an eagerness to learn and thrive on challenges
  • You will participate in semi annual Disaster Recovery (DR) fail over testing on regular basis as outlined in the banks policies and procedures, to ensure DR functionality
  • And, when required, update the policies and procedures as required

Do you have the skills that will enable you to succeed in this role?

  • You can demonstrate excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • You have hands on technical working experience in the administration, configuration & software builds in a large enterprise environment
  • You have at least 7+ years of hands on technical working experience with the system administration, installation, configuration & troubleshooting of Solaris (versions 10/11) and Red Hat Linux (versions 6/7/8) Operating Systems
  • You have at least 7+ of hands on technical working experience with the configuration, administration, builds and troubleshooting of Veritas/Symantec Storage Foundation (VSF) & Veritas/Symantec Cluster Services
  • You have at least 7+ of hands on technical working experience with Network Information Service (NFS), Solaris Zones & Solaris Logical Domains (LDoms) (NIS), Network File System
  • You have at least 7+ years of hands on experience with ZFS and Solaris Volume manager
  • You can demonstrate a very good technical working knowledge of SAN and Virtualization platforms/technologies
  • You possess very good scripting capabilities (eg, shell, perl) to complete day to day UNIX tasks
  • You have experience working with Oracle sparc and X86 hardware failures and trouble shooting, working with vendors for resolution You have good problem solving, troubleshooting and analytical skills
  • You can work well under pressure with time constraints and can prioritize competing priorities appropriately
  • You have completed a post secondary education in Computer Science, Engineering or in a related field of study

title: Network Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
As a key part of the infrastructure discipline within the IT Ops function in Inchcape, you will be responsible for working with all elements of the ISS IT Team including helpdesk and application support teams as well as development teams as a 3rd level of escalation. The Role delivering projects such as mergers and acquisitions, greenfield setups, cloud migrations, and equipment refresh. While also maintaining/monitoring the Existing applications and server environment in place.


Key Accountabilities

  • Provide Middle-level support within the Networking team for technical issues.
  • Administer global WAN and LAN configurations on existing Cisco equipment including TDM, Broadband, VSAT, VLANs, STP, VTP, and TCP/IP routing.
  • LAN-to-LAN (WAN) IPSEC VPN gateway administration. Experience with DMVPN.
  • Manage remote access environment and all RAS users including but not limited to Cisco VPN.
  • Maintain Cisco firewall appliance configuration and software.
  • Maintain Cisco IOS firewall implementations.
  • Maintain Cisco access points and Meraki
  • CISCO CCIE qualification required.
  • Maintain and implement cloud networking such as Azure and AWS
  • Maintain Citrix Load Balancers
  • Complete refresh of network hardware, ensuring devices are supported and updated to the latest firmware
  • End to End Network project planning and implementation.
  • Mentoring of junior Engineers.
  • Support of Senior Network Engineers
  • Maintain Cisco Switch installations including Catalyst Series experience.
  • AWS load Balancer -understanding of maintenance and managing.
  • AWS virtual Cisco routers and Firewalls - understanding of maintenance and managing.
  • AWS VPC and general Networking - understanding of maintenance and managing.
  • AWS VPN knowledge.
  • AWS bringing your own IP experience would be an advantage.
  • Grafana monitoring software.
  • Monitoring software (SolarWinds Preferably)
  • Global responsibility for security including network and Internet security and LAN/WAN security.
  • Work within strict change management structures to comply with standards.
  • Work with the Helpdesk ticketing response system.
  • Maintain network inventory
  • Document all current system deployments and log changes.
  • Create and maintain network monitoring procedures.
  • Knowledge of SNMP, Syslog, and Netflow technologies and deployment.
  • Knowledge of Monitoring Platforms (AWS cloud watch and SolarWinds Preferable.
  • Build new network and system deployments according to specified logical plans.
  • Be able to integrate new additional offices.
  • Provide problem troubleshooting and resolution to the end-user community.
  • Closely working with the service desk to resolve user issues and setup
  • Assist with complex production network issues
  • Coordinating Testing activities.
  • To effectively communicate across countries. Requires travel and coordination.
  • To provide user support, patiently, timely, and in an un-patronizing manner.
  • To coordinate with other groups within ISS to deliver projects and deal with escalated issues.
  • To provide escalated support to any level of user whilst on-call
  • Assist in managing risks and tracking issues.
  • Experience working across multiple teams to Help design applications - particularly within Cloud environments Identifying ports in use, assigning I.P. addresses, etc.

The post holder will carry out any other duties as are within the scope and purpose of the job as requested by the Line Manager and ensure full utilization of all ISS systems according to Standard Operating Procedures.


Knowledge

  • Degree educated
  • Knowledge of cloud networks and configurations
  • Automation
  • Full network lifecycle

Skills

  • Apply technology to deliver business vision
  • Presentation and facilitation
  • Highly adaptable, strong prioritization, and ability to work under pressure to meet deadlines with little oversight

Experience

  • Lead requirements and solution design
  • Cisco CCNA-RS,
  • CCNA-Security
  • AWS CSR
  • AWS VPC

Desirable

  • Cisco CCNP-Security
  • Cisco CCNP-Wireless

Other Requirements:

  • Ability to travel (national and international) and work flexibility
  • Able to work from home
  • Able to work aligned to UK Hours
  • Willing to work unsociable hours and be part of the on-call rotas.

This is a position in IT operations center for enabling reliable service operation.

Experience in managing and supporting network infrastructures

Strong ability to understand the network alerts, events or issues

Bachelors degree or engineering degree in Telecommunications/Information Technology/Computer Science or equivalent

Minimum of 5 years experience in Network technologies and services

Associate certification from any of network vendor NRS, JNCIA, CCNA or cloud GCP cloud engineer would be preferred

Good understanding on network technologies TCP/IP, TCP/IP Flow control, UDP, HSRP / VRRP / GLBP, DNS, ARP, Trunking, Port Channelling and IPsec

Good understanding with routing and dynamic routing protocols such as: OSPF, BGP

Good knowledge on Enterprise wired and wireless network, firewalls, virtualization, load balancing and SD-WAN technologies

Experience in with DHCP and IP address mgmt.

Experience in Windows server and Linux handling

Knowledge on Virtualization fundamentals

Knowledge on Cloud Compute engine DB will be preferred

Knowledge on scripting

Basics of virtual network and cloud connectivity

Basic understanding of common IT Infrastructure architecture and frameworks

Requirement gathering experience

Understanding of ITIL processes

Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English

Eager and capable to work in a global multi-cultural team and to develop him/her self

Strong customer focus

Drive to deliver results, get things done attitude

Follow troubleshooting mechanisms stated in SOPs and suggest corrective action or capture logs

Work in 24x7 support model and provide required shift handover

Create incident ticket for device alerts for non-auto-ticketing alerts, triage and escalate

Execute low critical service requests based on the SOPs

Own incident ticket resolution end-to-end and co-ordinations

Coordinate with cross-functional technology technical team to resolve the incident

Track intermediate issue until its closure working with multiple stakeholder

Follow the problem mgmt. process to get the root cause and problem task closure

Engage WAN service provider/Vendor/TAC to troubleshoot the issue and escalate to get is resolved

Additional duties as required and possible remote implementation assistance on special projects

Helping in ticket management and reporting task

Hands eye support co-ordination and vendor dispatch

title: Sr. Network Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
• Essenware Private Limted is looking for Senior Network Engineer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • The Senior Network Engineer is a highly skilled professional responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining an organization's network infrastructure
  • This role involves leading network-related projects, providing technical expertise, and ensuring the stability, security, and efficiency of the network environment
  • The Senior Network Engineer collaborates with cross-functional teams to support business objectives and maintain a robust and reliable network infrastructure
  • Key Responsibilities:Network Design and Implementation:Design and deploy complex network solutions to meet business requirements
  • Plan and execute network upgrades, expansions, and migrations
  • Evaluate and recommend new networking technologies and solutions
  • Network Security:Implement and maintain network security protocols, firewalls, and intrusion detection/prevention systems
  • Monitor network traffic for any suspicious activity and take appropriate measures to mitigate security threats
  • Conduct regular security assessments and audits to ensure compliance with security policies and industry standards
  • Network Troubleshooting and Support:Diagnose and resolve complex network issues to minimize downtime and optimize network performance
  • Provide technical support to junior network engineers and helpdesk teams
  • Participate in an on-call rotation to address network emergencies and incidents
  • Network Performance Monitoring and Optimization:Monitor network performance and bandwidth utilization to identify and resolve bottlenecks
  • Conduct regular performance tuning to optimize network efficiency
  • Implement Quality of Service (QoS) policies to prioritize critical network traffic
  • Vendor Management:Collaborate with vendors and service providers to ensure the timely delivery of network services and equipment
  • Manage vendor relationships, negotiate contracts, and evaluate service level agreements (SLAs)
  • Documentation and Reporting:Create and maintain detailed network documentation, including network diagrams, configurations, and change logs
  • Generate periodic reports on network performance, security, and capacity
  • Network Capacity Planning:Analyze network traffic patterns and plan for future network expansion and upgrades
  • Forecast capacity requirements to meet the organization's growth needs
  • Compliance and Regulations:Ensure the network infrastructure adheres to relevant industry regulations and compliance standards
  • Participate in audits and assessments to demonstrate compliance with security and regulatory requirements

title: India - Network/ Sr. Network Engineer
location: Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Bengaluru
jobDescription:
We have an exciting opportunity for a Network / Sr. Network Engineer in our Global IT Team. As a key part of the infrastructure discipline within the IT Ops function in Inchcape, you will be responsible for working with all elements of the ISS IT Team this including helpdesk and application support teams as well as development teams as a 3rd level of escalation. The Role delivering projects such as mergers and acquisitions, greenfield setups, cloud migrations, and equipment refresh. While also maintaining/monitoring the Existing applications and server environment in place.


Key Accountabilities

  • Provide Middle-level support within the Networking team for technical issues.
  • Administer global WAN and LAN configurations on existing Cisco equipment including TDM, Broadband, VSAT, VLANs, STP, VTP, and TCP/IP routing.
  • LAN-to-LAN (WAN) IPSEC VPN gateway administration. Experience with DMVPN.
  • Manage remote access environment and all RAS users including but not limited to Cisco VPN.
  • Maintain Cisco firewall appliance configuration and software.
  • Maintain Cisco IOS firewall implementations.
  • Maintain Cisco access points and Meraki
  • CISCO CCIE qualification required.
  • Maintain and implement cloud networking such as Azure and AWS
  • Maintain Citrix Load Balancers
  • Complete refresh of network hardware, ensuring devices are supported and updated to the latest firmware
  • End-to-end Network project planning and implementation.
  • Mentoring of junior Engineers.
  • Support of Senior Network Engineers
  • Maintain Cisco Switch installations including Catalyst Series experience.
  • AWS load Balancer -understanding of maintenance and managing.
  • AWS virtual Cisco routers and Firewalls - understanding of maintenance and managing.
  • AWS VPC and general Networking - understanding of maintenance and managing.
  • AWS VPN knowledge.
  • AWS bringing your own IP experience would be an advantage.
  • Grafana monitoring software.
  • Monitoring software (SolarWinds Preferably)
  • Global responsibility for security including network and Internet security and LAN/WAN security.
  • Work within strict change management structures to comply with standards.
  • Work with the Helpdesk ticketing response system.
  • Maintain network inventor
  • Document all current system deployments and log changes
  • Create and maintain network monitoring procedures and knowledge of SNMP, Syslog, and Netflow technologies and deployment.
  • Knowledge of Monitoring Platforms (AWS Cloud Watch and SolarWinds Preferable
  • Build new network and system deployments according to specified logical plans.
  • Be able to integrate new additional offices.
  • Provide problem troubleshooting and resolution to the end-user community.
  • Closely working with the service desk to resolve user issues and setup
  • Assist with complex production network issues
  • Coordinating Testing activities.
  • To effectively communicate across countries. Requires travel and coordination.
  • To provide user support, patiently, timely, and in an un-patronizing manner.
  • Coordinate with other groups within ISS to deliver projects and deal with escalated issues.
  • To provide escalated support to any level of user whilst on-call
  • Assist in managing risks and tracking issues.
  • Experience working across multiple teams to Help design applications - particularly within Cloud environments Identifying ports in use, assigning i.p. addresses, etc.
  • The post holder will carry out any other duties as are within the scope and purpose of the job as requested by the Line Manager and ensure full utilization of all ISS systems according to Standard Operating Procedures.

Experience (Must have)

  • Lead requirements and solution design
  • Cisco CCNA-RS,
  • CCNA-Security
  • AWS CSR
  • AWS VPC


Desirable (Good to have, but not mandatory)

  • Cisco CCNP-Security
  • Cisco CCNP-Wireless

Other Requirements:

  • Ability to travel (national and international) and work flexibility
  • Able to work from home
  • Able to work aligned to UK Hours
  • Willing to work unsociable hours and be part of the on-call rotas.
